availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson, Kentucky, bricklayer. Kentucky native. Married to Caroline Thurston Tuell on December 19, 1854. Father of Susan P. Tuell and C. H. Tuell. Brucklayer in Henderson in 1860. Gentleman of leisure in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 10; Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Ancestry, Marriages, Hardin County, Kentucky, December 19, 1854; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky, Congressional District 2, Henderson County, Kentucky, 1863, p. 276; Find A Grave, "John Tuell (1829-1864)," Memorial #85255530, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=85255530&ref=acom (accessed July 31, 2017).
